amendment.description: An amendment numbered 180 printed in Part A of House Report 118-216 to prohibit the use of funds made available by this Act from enforcing any COVID-19 mask mandates.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rosendale amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rosendale amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rosendale amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
